summary text for SEPA Mandates. For rendering preferences use ${PREF_ID} syntax
attribute-definition.default-value: I authorize the creditor ${paymentGatewaySEPAMandateName} to send instructions to my bank to collect one single direct debit from my account. At the same time I instruct my bank to debit my account in accordance with the instructions from the creditor ${paymentGatewaySEPAMandateName} Note: As part of my rights, I am entitled to a refund under the terms and conditions of my agreement with my bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which my account was debited. I irrevocably agree that, in the event that the direct debit is not honored, or objection against the direct debit exists, my bank will disclose to the creditor ${paymentGatewaySEPAMandateName} my full name, address and date of birth. Type of payment: one-off.

attribute-definition.display-name: SEPA text for acceppting terms and conditions
attribute-definition.default-value: I have read and accepted the SEPA Direct Debit Mandate information

attribute-definition.description: Unique identifier assigned to your merchant account.
Unique identifier assigned to your 3-D Secure merchant account. Can be set to "null" to force SSL process.
Username as provided in your Wirecard contract.
Password as provided in your Wirecard contract.
Secret Key is mandatory to calculate the Digital Signature for the 3-D Secure payment.
Wirecard Server Address (URL) (e.g. https://api.wirecard.com).
Amount in default shop currency
Select between "Purchase" to capture/invoice your order automatically or "Authorization" to capture/invoice manually.
Additional data will be sent for the purpose of fraud protection. This additional data includes billing/shipping address, shopping basket and descriptor.
Send text which is displayed on the bank statement issued to your consumer by the financial service provider.
Convert „3-D Secure Min. Limit“ (amount in default Site’s currency) to any currency (e.g. “USD”:”1.12”)
